clear-history.title: Clear history?
clear-history.desc: This will remove all scan, update, and action history. Logs and quarantine items will not be affected.

clear-acknowledged.title: Clear acknowledged entries?
clear-acknowledged.desc: This will remove only acknowledged history entries. Unresolved events will remain.

clear-errors.title: Clear all errors?
clear-errors.desc: This will remove all errors in the history table. Rest of these events will remain.
